sentence: Somehow former football player and Republican Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker is still convincing folks that hes the man for the job.
author: Angela Johnson
title: Herschel Walker Endorsed by Pro-Life Organization

sentence: Hes expected to face former NFL player Herschel Walker in the general election.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Warnock easily secures Democratic Senate nomination in Georgia

sentence: Former NFL star Herschel Walker is projected to easily clinch the Republican Senate nomination in Georgia, securing his spot on the ballot to face off against Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-Ga.) in November.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Herschel Walker clinches GOP Senate nomination in Georgia
